text:
With so much focus on SEO content, we often times forget about other forms of content like brand building content. Canny is a a three years old bootstrapped SaaS startup that is already doing $800k ARR with a seven-member team :rocket: and a huge reason for their success is the brand building content.

 I was very interested in understanding their approach to content marketing. After researching and reaching out their team, I’ve put down six content marketing lessons we can all learn from Canny. I really enjoyed it putting it together. Hope you enjoy reading it as well.

<https://bit.ly/3jeilXN>

attachments.title: 6 Content Marketing Lessons to Learn from Bootstrapped $800k ARR Canny
